</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Arguments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets material of object selection. The selection number is defined through the [[CfgVehicles_Config_Reference#hiddenSelections | hiddenselection]][]<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>{} array in the vehicle's config (starting with 0).   </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> obj '''setObjectMaterial''' [selectionNumber, material] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> obj: [[Object]]  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [selectionNumber, material]: [[Array]]  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> selectionNumber: [[Number]]  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> material: [[String]]  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER4</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 


</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>car [[setObjectMaterial]] [0,"A3\Structures_F\Data\Windows\window_set.rvmat"];
car [[setObjectMaterial]] [1,"A3\Structures_F\Data\Windows\window_set.rvmat"];</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
